alert.note: Alert for Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Western Colusa County; Shasta Lake Area, Northern Shasta County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 01 at 1:57PM PST until January 02 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TO 10 PM PST MONDAY ABOVE 2000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected. 1 to 4 inches above 2000 ft, 3 to 10 inches above 5000 ft. * WHERE...Shasta Lake Area / Northern Shasta County and Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Western Colusa County Counties. This includes Interstate 5 in far northern Shasta County. * WHEN...From 8 AM to 10 PM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Western Colusa County; Shasta Lake Area, Northern Shasta County
